entry.title: Monday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 9.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness this evening. Wind becoming southeast 20 km/h after midnight. Low minus 9. Wind chill minus 8 this evening and minus 17 overnight. Forecast issued 5:44 PM MDT Monday 20 March 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of flurries. High minus 3. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries late in the morning and early afternoon. Wind southeast 20 km/h becoming light in the morning. High minus 3. Wind chill minus 17 in the morning and minus 8 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 5:44 PM MDT Monday 20 March 2023
